description: Try our easy to follow Slow-Cooked Pork Shoulder recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Slow-Cooked Pork Shoulder Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 orange, 3 strips of peel (save 1/2 cup orange juice for later)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C. Remove netting from pork shoulder. Re-tie with kitchen twine at 5cm intervals.
Combine salt, five spice, and pepper in a bowl. Rub salt mixture over surface of pork. Place into a roasting pan. Drizzle with oil and roast for 1 hour.
Combine chicken stock, soy sauce, orange peel, orange juice, garlic, ginger, shallots, sugar and cinnamon sticks in a bowl.

Remove pork from oven. Pour liquid mixture around pork. Cover with foil. Roast for 3 hours or until meat is tender. Transfer to a chopping board. Cover with foil to keep warm. Stand for 10 minutes before slicing (reserve 6 cups of pork for pork sliders).
Place roasting pan over medium heat and bring pan juices to the boil. Combine cornflour and 1tbs cold water in a bowl. Add to sauce. Stir until sauce thickens.
Bring pan of water to boil. Add 2 bunches trimmed broccollini. Cook for 1 minute or until tender. Drain. Serve with pork and sauce.
